dct_title_s: A new map of Hindoostan : from the latest authorities, chiefly from the actual surveys of the Bengal provinces and of the countries lying between them and Dehly : the whole exhibiting all the military roads and passes, as well as the most accurate division of the British possessions in the East Indies
